abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32552164, pmid32647066, pmid32745348, pmid32738141, pmid32738239, pmid32738546, pmid32737471
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.08.04
